name: Ocean Players
description: Developed a mobile application and admin panel for Ocean Players, a dynamic Android platform aimed at delivering seamless user experiences in the entertainment/sports domain. The mobile app was built using React Native, focusing on performance and cross-platform compatibility. The admin panel, built in ReactJS, facilitates real-time content and user management.

name: Meal One
description: Built a tiffin delivery platform, Meal One, featuring a user-friendly Android app for customers and a ReactJS-based admin panel for managing meals, orders, and users. The mobile app was developed using React Native with Redux for efficient state management and Async Storage for persistent local data handling. Tailwind CSS was used to design a clean and responsive UI in the admin panel. Focused on enhancing speed, scalability, and seamless user experience across both platforms.

name: AI ChatBot
description: Developed a smart chatbot application integrated with the Gemini API to enable AI-powered conversational interactions. The Android app, built with React Native, offers real-time messaging with persistent conversation history using Async Storage. Employed Redux for efficient state management and Tailwind CSS for designing a modern, responsive admin panel in ReactJS. The solution was optimized for speed, scalability, and seamless user experience for both end users and administrators.

name: AI ChatBot
description: Developed a full-stack social media platform inspired by Metaâ€™s Threads, focusing on seamless user interactions and real-time content sharing. Implemented core features such as posting, liking, commenting, and profile viewing using ReactJS. Utilized Redux for robust state management and Redux Persist for maintaining user sessions. Tailwind CSS was used to craft a clean, responsive, and modern UI. The app emphasizes scalability, user experience, and smooth performance across devices.
